game.name: Earthworms
game.shortDescription: Detective story in a hand-painted, surrealist world of science-fiction. Full of riddles and puzzles, with a tone of pulp, horror and comedy. Inspired by movies and TV shows like: Donnie Darko, X Files, Stranger Things, Twin Peaks.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Detective story in a hand-painted, surrealist world of science-fiction. Full of riddles and puzzles, with a tone of pulp, horror and comedy. Inspired by movies and TV shows like: Donnie Darko, X Files, Stranger Things, Twin Peaks.
game.publishers: Ultimate Games S.A., Art Games Studio S.A.

reviewHighlights.text: Earthworms is a classic point & click adventure game. It has a supernatural/dark story. Like in other point&click games you can look at things, pick u...
